acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused Sri Sanjay Bhumij is absent. P/A issued against him returned after being executed. I have very carefully gone through the service reports on P/As. Considering all aspects examination of the EO is dispensed with and service reports are accepted. Accordingly the case is filed against the accused person till his arrest.         Seen the petition filed by the bailor praying for exempting him from the liability of the bail bond executed in favour of the accused Sri Sanjay Bhumij by imposing a fine of Rs. 20,000/- on the ground stated therein. I have very carefully gone through the bail bond submitted by the bailor wherein bail amount has been mentioned as 30,000/-. Considering all aspects the bail bond is hereby forfeited under section 446 of the CrPC and bailor is sentenced with a fine of Rs. 20,000/- i/d imprisonment for 6 (Six) months. Let Rs. 10,000/- out of fine money be paid to the DLSA, Diphu, Karbi Anglong if paid.         Later on, the fine money amounting Rs. 20,000/- is paid. Let Rs. 10,000/- be deposited with the Treasury, Govt. of Assam and the rest be paid to the DLSA, Diphu, Karbi Anglong.         Accordingly this case id disposed of
